description:
Toriko, Sunny, and Coco set out on a death-defying quest to see who can track down the most irresistible sweets for a starving Seven-Colored Nellie!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bishoku Ou Ketteisen! Kyuukyoku no Sweets o Sagase!
The Gourmet King Championship! Search for the Ultimate Sweets!
美食王決定戦! 究極のスイーツを探せ!
